title: Why should we study the history behind the social science disciplines? - Quora

response.answer_text: You are studying the history of social science in order to understand the evolution of problems in social science. There are a lot of interesting personal details about the pioneers of social science as well, but the main focus is on the development of the course of knowledge. Graduate students in particular must have this sense of development if they are to produce new knowledge. Many of the early pioneers in social science have been eclipsed today, but they were asking the right questions—questions that we have not completely answered even today.
